Package Assignment3.businessLayer

Class BillsBLL

java.lang.Object
Assignment3.businessLayer.BillsBLL
public class BillsBLL extends Object
This class represents the data access object class for the Bill class
Author:
Tudor Cristea

  • Constructor Details

    • BillsBLL

      public BillsBLL()
      This is the only constructor of this class. It creates a new bill data access object in order to facilitate the communication with the database

  • Method Details

    • findAllBills

      public ArrayList<Bill> findAllBills() throws Exception
      This method returns the list of all bills from the database
      Returns:
      the list of bills
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the bill dao

    • insertBill

      public void insertBill(Orders orders, Client client, Product product) throws Exception
      This method computes the id of the new product, and then inserts a new product into the database
      Parameters:
      orders - the order corresponding to the new bill
      client - the client corresponding to the new bill
      product - the product corresponding to the new bill
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the product dao
